article.title: Cool App-titude: Free Military Wallpaper
article.author: Rachel Eisenhower
article.abstract: Show your military pride with a series of free Android apps that provide smart phone wallpaper for the Army, Navy, Air Force, Marines and Coast Guard.
article.text: Show your military pride with a series of free Android apps that provide smart phone wallpaper for the Army, Navy, Air Force, Marines and Coast Guard. Each app includes 10 images taken by U.S. Defense Department photographers. Individual programs exist for each branch of service, and they can all be downloaded for free courtesy of MilitaryAirfare.us with developer BaxBox Innovative Products. Download the Navy Wallpaper app for photos of aircraft carriers and other scenes from naval life. The Marines Wallpaper includes images of night vision technology and special ops, and the Army Wallpaper app shows troops, tanks and other snapshots of soldiers. The Coast Guard Wallpaper app includes helicopters and ships, and the Air Force app shows off life in the sky. In addition, the free MilitaryAirfare.us app provides military personnel with travel deals. Service members can receive up to 60-percent off fares. The app gives users complete access to the travel booking site and information on how to contact a customer representative for help. Your military ID may be required. These sites are not affiliated with AFCEA or SIGNAL Magazine, and we are not responsible for the content or quality of the products offered. When visiting new websites, please use proper Internet security procedures.
